title: Diabetes Progression Analysis
description: Developed a predictive model for diabetes progression using real-world medical datasets. Implemented regression techniques to estimate disease progression over time based on health indicators such as BMI, blood pressure, and glucose levels. The project explores data preprocessing, feature selection, and evaluation metrics to assess model performance.
imageAlt: Detailed data visualization of medical dataset

title: Interactive Portfolio Website
description: A modern, fully-featured portfolio website built with vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Features include dark mode, cursor trail effects, interactive terminal, testimonials carousel, and comprehensive accessibility support. Demonstrates advanced front-end development skills without framework dependencies.

title: Your Next Amazing Project
